mapper.select: SELECT id, city_id, name, image_url, description, strategy_guide, view_count, rating, create_time FROM attraction ORDER BY (view_count * 0.7 + rating * 50 * 0.3) DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.city_id, a.name, a.image_url, a.description, a.strategy_guide, a.view_count, a.rating, a.create_time FROM attraction a LEFT JOIN city c ON a.city_id = c.id LEFT JOIN province p ON c.province_id = p.id WHERE a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR p.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY a.view_count DESC
